sentences_tone.text: DEMI LOVATO TAKES AIM AT HER TEEN FANS ON 'THE TONIGHT SHOW'Demi Lovato appeared on Jimmy Fallon's Tonight Show and did a complete roast of her teen fans.
Lovato dressed in a sequinned top, pigtails, and pretended to make out with a pillow with fellow singer Ed Sheeran's face on it.
During Lovato's act, Fallon responded by kissing a pillow featuring Extra's Mario Lopez.
